scenes.description: Omaru Polka, Ookami Mio, and Oozora Subaru perform 'Paradise Lost'.
Omaru Polka welcomes the other guests to the stage for the next song.
Omaru Polka, Ookami Mio, Oozora Subaru, Nakiri Ayame, Takane Lui, and Kazama Iroha perform a special version of 'GIRLS' LEGEND U'.

subtitles.original: 離さない
subtitles.english: I won't let go

subtitles.original: 見つめて Paradise Lost
subtitles.english: Staring at Paradise Lost

subtitles.original: Wow wow wow wow wow wow wow yeah
subtitles.english: Wow wow wow wow wow wow wow yeah

subtitles.original: やっとみんな会えたね！
